security: Providing commo training could expose methods and personnel if HARTA were compromised. "REQUEST PRITY POA TO HOLUDE COMMO TRAINING FOR HARTA (VALDES)"
summary: A cable requests priority provisioning of communications training for HARTA (VALDES), a Cuban statistician potentially returning to Cuba, highlighting operational needs.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET cable requests immediate priority communications training for HARTA (VALDES), a Cuban individual identified as MA183 who previously resided in Havana. VALDES is described as a statistician employed by the Ministry of Health and Welfare in Havana, with a possibility of returning to Cuba around July 23. The cable indicates that Valdes has ostensibly completed lengthy studies with the World Health Organization. The communication stresses the need for DElTA's involvement.
title: Request for Priority Communications Training for HARTA (VALDES)
